message: Let's start fair. I take the lion's share, but you get a decent chunk to start.
Your offer was a bit too greedy.  Let's be reasonable and split the difference for a win-win.
Let's compromise. I'm willing to give up some of my share, but I still need to get the majority.
This is getting us nowhere. A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Let's end this and both get something.
